types:type.name: input
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type input = Array<{| id: Number, name: String, salary: Number, phone: String, city: String|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0"}

types:type.name: output
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type output = Array<{| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, name: String, salary: Number {"typeId": "int"}, phone: Number {"typeId": "int"}, city: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"id\\\":123,\\\"name\\\":\\\"man\\\",\\\"salary\\\":234,\\\"phone\\\":8973329,\\\"city\\\":\\\"fcrr\\\"},{\\\"id\\\":143,\\\"name\\\":\\\"ma\\\",\\\"salary\\\":23,\\\"phone\\\":897329,\\\"city\\\":\\\"fcr\\\"}]"}
